libshapedraw.primitive

Interface ReadonlyLineStyle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineStyle

    public interface ReadonlyLineStyle
extends java.io.Serializable
    Read-only interface for LineStyle objects, allowing for compile-time safety.
    See Also:
    LineStyle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LineStyle copy() 
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object other) 
      ReadonlyColor getMainReadonlyColor() 
      float getMainWidth() 
      ReadonlyColor getSecondaryReadonlyColor() 
      float getSecondaryWidth() 
      boolean glApply(boolean useSecondary)
      Convenience method that sets the OpenGL state to match this line style.
      int hashCode() 
      boolean hasSecondaryColor() 
      boolean isAnimating() 
      java.lang.String toString() 

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        LineStyle copy()
        Returns:
        a new deep-copied mutable LineStyle.

        Same concept as Object.clone(), minus the tedious/clunky checked exception, CloneNotSupportedException.

      • getMainReadonlyColor

        ReadonlyColor getMainReadonlyColor()
        Returns:
        a read-only view of the main line color.

      • getMainWidth

        float getMainWidth()
        Returns:
        the main line width.

      • getSecondaryReadonlyColor

        ReadonlyColor getSecondaryReadonlyColor()
        Returns:
        a read-only view of the secondary line color. May be null.

      • getSecondaryWidth

        float getSecondaryWidth()
        Returns:
        the secondary line width, which is unused if the secondary line color is null.

      • hasSecondaryColor

        boolean hasSecondaryColor()
        Returns:
        true if the secondary line color is null.

      • glApply

        boolean glApply(boolean useSecondary)
        Convenience method that sets the OpenGL state to match this line style. I.e., call glColor4d, glLineWidth, and glDepthFunc.
        Returns:
        false if the OpenGL state was not set due to the secondary color not being set for this line style.

      • isAnimating

        boolean isAnimating()
        Returns:
        true if either of this line style's colors is being updated by an active animation.

        The line widths can be animated by a Timeline too, but not an internal one: LineStyle does not implement the full Animates interface.

      • equals

        boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • hashCode

        int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
